column2: Martin Marietta Materials, Inc. engages in the provision of aggregates including crushed stone, sand, and gravel through its network of quarries and distribution yards. The company is headquartered in Raleigh, North Carolina and currently employs 8,714 full-time employees. Aggregates products are also used for railroad ballast and in agricultural, utility and environmental applications. The firm's Aggregates business operates through three segments: the Mid-America Group, Southeast Group and West Group. The firm's business is categorized into Aggregates Business, Cement Business and Magnesia Specialties Business. Its Cement business is reported through the Cement segment. Its Magnesia Specialties business manufactures and markets magnesia-based chemical products used in industrial, agricultural, and environmental applications, and dolomitic lime sold to customers in the steel industry. Its Cement business produces Portland and specialty cements. The company manufactures and markets, through its Magnesia Specialties business, magnesia-based chemical products.
